protocol_name: Isolation Of Total DNA From NC64A Chlorella
protocol_name_html: Isolation Of Total DNA From NC64A Chlorella
before_start:
Autodigest Proteinase K, 25 mg/mL, at 37°C 60 min prior to use
Heat RNAse A, 10 mg/mL, at 80°C 10 min prior to use
guidelines:
MATERIALS:

1) NC64A chlorella
2) Sterile 500 mL flasks
3) MBBM
4) 50 mM NaHPO4, pH 7.4, 2.0 M NaCl
5) 20% SDS
6) Proteinase K, 25 mg/mL, autodigested at 37°C, 60 min prior to use
7) RNAse A, 10 mg/mL, heated at 80°C, 10 min prior to use
8) 5 M KOAc
9) 3 M NaOAc
10) 100% EtOH
11) 70% EtOH
12) Isopropanol
13) 50 mM Tris-HCl, pH 8.0, 10 mM EDTA
14) 10 mM Tris-HCl, pH 8.0, 1 mM EDTA (1X TE)
15) Sterile d-H2O

components.data: Inoculate 500 mL flasks with NC64A chlorella, each flask to contain 360 mL of cells at 1.2 X 106 cells/mL in MBBM.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Inoculate 500 mL flasks with NC64A chlorella, each flask to contain 360 mL of cells at 1.2 X 106 cells/mL in MBBM.

components.data: Incubate the flasks at 25°C for 72 hours, with continuous light and shaking.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate the flasks at 25°C for 72 hours, with continuous light and shaking.

components.data: Count the cells.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Count the cells.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 3 of Isolation Of Total DNA From NC64A Chlorella
source_data.protocol_name: Isolation Of Total DNA From NC64A Chlorella
source_data.protocol_name_html: Isolation Of Total DNA From NC64A Chlorella
source_data.annotation: Cells concentration should be 1.0-2.0 X 10<sup>7</sup> cells/mL.
source_data.thread_text: Cells concentration should be 1.0-2.0 X 10<sup>7</sup> cells/mL.
source_data.body: Cells concentration should be 1.0-2.0 X 10<sup>7</sup> cells/mL.

components.data: Concentrate aliquots of NC64A chlorella, each aliquot to contain 6.0 X 109 cells.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Concentrate aliquots of NC64A chlorella, each aliquot to contain 6.0 X 109 cells.

components.data: If the cells are to be infected with virus, infection should be at an moi (multiplicity of infection) of 3-5.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: If the cells are to be infected with virus, infection should be at an moi (multiplicity of infection) of 3-5.

components.data: Centrifuge the samples in the Sorvall GSA rotor at 5,000 rpm, 5 min, 4°C to harvest the cells.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge the samples in the Sorvall GSA rotor at 5,000 rpm, 5 min, 4°C to harvest the cells.

components.data: Wash the cells 1X with sterile d-H<sub>2</sub>O in the Sorvall HB-4 rotor at 5,000 rpm, 5 min, 4°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash the cells 1X with sterile d-H<sub>2</sub>O in the Sorvall HB-4 rotor at 5,000 rpm, 5 min, 4°C.

components.data: Quick freeze the cells pellets with liquid N<sub>2</sub> and store the frozen pellets at -80°C until ready for processing.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Quick freeze the cells pellets with liquid N<sub>2</sub> and store the frozen pellets at -80°C until ready for processing.

components.data: Resuspend each frozen sample with 5.0 mL of 50 mM NaHPO<sub>4</sub>, pH 7.4, 2.0 M NaCl.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend each frozen sample with 5.0 mL of 50 mM NaHPO<sub>4</sub>, pH 7.4, 2.0 M NaCl.

components.data: Heat the samples at 65°C for 30 min (leave in the MSK flasks during the heating).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Heat the samples at 65°C for 30 min (leave in the MSK flasks during the heating).

components.data: Break the samples a second time in the MSK for 30 sec with CO<sub>2</sub> cooling.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Break the samples a second time in the MSK for 30 sec with CO<sub>2</sub> cooling.

components.data: Recover the homogenates to clean tubes (SS34 plastic tubes).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Recover the homogenates to clean tubes (SS34 plastic tubes).

components.data: Remove a 0.3 mL aliquot from each sample to microfuge tubes for determination of the 			original DNA concentration for each sample (use the fluorometric procedure).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove a 0.3 mL aliquot from each sample to microfuge tubes for determination of the 			original DNA concentration for each sample (use the fluorometric procedure).

components.data: Treat each sample with 500 µL of proteinase K for 60 min at 37°C (add 200 µL/sample).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Treat each sample with 500 µL of proteinase K for 60 min at 37°C (add 200 µL/sample).

components.data: Heat the samples at 65°C for 5 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Heat the samples at 65°C for 5 min.

components.data: Add 20% SDS to each sample to a final concentration of 1% (add 500 µL/sample).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 20% SDS to each sample to a final concentration of 1% (add 500 µL/sample).

components.data: Add 2.7 mL of 5 M KOAc to each sample, mix well (a final concentration of 1 M).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 2.7 mL of 5 M KOAc to each sample, mix well (a final concentration of 1 M).

components.data: Incubate the samples in the cold room for 30 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate the samples in the cold room for 30 min.

components.data: Treat the samples with RNAse at 200 µg/mL for 2 hours at 37°C (add 200 µL/sample).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Treat the samples with RNAse at 200 µg/mL for 2 hours at 37°C (add 200 µL/sample).

components.data: Precipitate the DNAs in the samples by adding 2X volumes of 100% EtOH (approximately 30 mL/sample).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Precipitate the DNAs in the samples by adding 2X volumes of 100% EtOH (approximately 30 mL/sample).

components.data: Centrifuge the tubes in the Sorvall HB-4 rotor at 10,000 rpm, 15 min, 4°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge the tubes in the Sorvall HB-4 rotor at 10,000 rpm, 15 min, 4°C.

components.data: Resuspend each DNA sample with 3.5 mL of 50 mM Tris-HCl, pH 8.0, 10 mM EDTA.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend each DNA sample with 3.5 mL of 50 mM Tris-HCl, pH 8.0, 10 mM EDTA.

components.data: Dialyze the samples overnight at 4°C against several changes of 50 mM Tris-HCl, pH 8.0, 10 mM EDTA.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dialyze the samples overnight at 4°C against several changes of 50 mM Tris-HCl, pH 8.0, 10 mM EDTA.

components.data: Add 375 µL of 3 M NaOAc to each sample.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 375 µL of 3 M NaOAc to each sample.

components.data: Centrifuge the samples in the Sorvall SS34 rotor at 10,000 rpm, 20 min, 4°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge the samples in the Sorvall SS34 rotor at 10,000 rpm, 20 min, 4°C.

components.data: Wash the DNA pellets 1X with 10 mL of 70% EtOH in the Sorvall SS34 rotor at 10,000 rpm, 5 min, 4°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash the DNA pellets 1X with 10 mL of 70% EtOH in the Sorvall SS34 rotor at 10,000 rpm, 5 min, 4°C.

components.data: Dry the pellets briefly (10-15 min) in the vacuum desiccator to remove the EtOH.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dry the pellets briefly (10-15 min) in the vacuum desiccator to remove the EtOH.

components.data: Determine the DNA concentration of the samples using the fluorometric procedure.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Determine the DNA concentration of the samples using the fluorometric procedure.

components.data: Run CsCl gradients.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Run CsCl gradients.

components.data: Centrifuge the required volume of cells for each aliquot in the Sorvall GSA rotor at 5,000 rpm, 5 min, 4°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge the required volume of cells for each aliquot in the Sorvall GSA rotor at 5,000 rpm, 5 min, 4°C.

components.data: Resuspend each aliquot with 160 mL of fresh MBBM.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend each aliquot with 160 mL of fresh MBBM.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 6 of Isolation Of Total DNA From NC64A Chlorella
source_data.protocol_name: Isolation Of Total DNA From NC64A Chlorella
source_data.protocol_name_html: Isolation Of Total DNA From NC64A Chlorella
source_data.annotation: The final concentration of cells is to be 4.0 X 10<sup>7</sup> cells/mL.
source_data.thread_text: The final concentration of cells is to be 4.0 X 10<sup>7</sup> cells/mL.
source_data.body: The final concentration of cells is to be 4.0 X 10<sup>7</sup> cells/mL.

components.data: Incubate the flasks for 45-60 min at 25°C for the cells to acclimate to the new media.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate the flasks for 45-60 min at 25°C for the cells to acclimate to the new media.

components.data: Incubate the flasks for the desired length of time at 25°C with continuous light and shaking.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate the flasks for the desired length of time at 25°C with continuous light and shaking.

components.data: Discard the supernatants.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Discard the supernatants.

components.data: Break the cells in the MSK mechanical homogenizer with 5.0 gm of 0.3 mm glass beads for 60 sec, with CO<sub>2</sub> cooling.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Break the cells in the MSK mechanical homogenizer with 5.0 gm of 0.3 mm glass beads for 60 sec, with CO<sub>2</sub> cooling.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 15 of Isolation Of Total DNA From NC64A Chlorella
source_data.protocol_name: Isolation Of Total DNA From NC64A Chlorella
source_data.protocol_name_html: Isolation Of Total DNA From NC64A Chlorella
source_data.annotation: Take care not to freeze the samples.
source_data.thread_text: Take care not to freeze the samples.
source_data.body: Take care not to freeze the samples.

components.data: Wash the glass beads with 50 mM NaHPO<sub>4</sub>, pH 7.4, 2.0 M NaCl.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash the glass beads with 50 mM NaHPO<sub>4</sub>, pH 7.4, 2.0 M NaCl.

components.data: Add the washes to the homogenates.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add the washes to the homogenates.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 20 of Isolation Of Total DNA From NC64A Chlorella
source_data.protocol_name: Isolation Of Total DNA From NC64A Chlorella
source_data.protocol_name_html: Isolation Of Total DNA From NC64A Chlorella
source_data.annotation: The final volume is to be 10.3 mL.
source_data.thread_text: The final volume is to be 10.3 mL.
source_data.body: The final volume is to be 10.3 mL.

components.data: Centrifuge the sample in the Sorvall SS34 rotor at 14,000 rpm, 20 min, 4°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge the sample in the Sorvall SS34 rotor at 14,000 rpm, 20 min, 4°C.

components.data: Decant the supernatants to clean tubes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Decant the supernatants to clean tubes.

components.data: Store at -20°C for 2-3 hours.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Store at -20°C for 2-3 hours.

components.data: Discard the supernatants.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Discard the supernatants.

components.data: Precipitate the DNAs by adding an equal volume of isopropanol to each tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Precipitate the DNAs by adding an equal volume of isopropanol to each tube.

components.data: Mix well and hold at room temperature for 30 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Mix well and hold at room temperature for 30 min.

components.data: Discard the supernatants.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Discard the supernatants.

components.data: Resuspend the pellets with 2.0 mL of 1X TE buffer.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend the pellets with 2.0 mL of 1X TE buffer.
